data.message: Tip: Use WASD or Arrow keys to move around.
Tip: Walk into enemies to attack them.
Tip: Walk over items to pick them up automatically.
Tip: Watch your HP! Use potions (I key) to heal.
Tip: Leveling up increases your max HP and attack damage.
Tip: Step on stairs (>) and move to descend deeper.
Tip: Press I for inventory, C for character stats, M for message log.
Tip: Elite enemies (bright red) are tougher but give more XP!
Tip: Lore items reveal the story. Read them from your inventory.
Tip: BOSS FIGHT! These powerful foes have special abilities and drop rare loot!
